Un-Marketplace the Marketplace

  1. Constructive Criticism NOT Hard Rejections
  2. Build Relationships NOT Support Queues
  3. Flat Fee Per Account NOT % Per Sale
  4. Instant Updates NOT Endless Waiting
  5. Freemium NOT Exclusivity
  6. Exposure NOT Obscurity
